track.name: Police and Thieves
comments: Today police are worst than a thief, they shoot the youth down in cold blood without any recompense.  Jah will have the wicked in derision on that day of the last trump.

If you like the The Clash version that much, stick with it. Don't come to this page and talk shit about a masterpiece that you don't know nothin about. Yes I lent an ear to the Clash version, and in my humble opinion it's way to screw up a brilliant song. Soulless piece of crap. Perfect for teenagers who want to take their "teen rage" out on social issues. Nothing more. Junior is the truth. Seek him.
hm. after the eveneing news, some of them are thieves.
i don´t think they are thieves...
Police and thieves in the street.  England.  August 2011.
Thankfully I have a 12 inch.
Mike TV - this is a lame version, you need the original 12" vinyl version, with it's assorted ultra heavy dub versions and studio imperfections, working the magic. It is a true classic.
this is nice and all, but the Clash's version doesn't make me want to fall asleep..
